name: Tomy Dungeon
description:
Made from Scratch in a 72 Hour Game Jam!
Tomy Dungeon is a Top-Down Adventure where you have to find the best Loot for defeating "Heinrich-The-Boss-Dude". You also have to defeat several Enemies to get the Keys to open the doors.

Will you make it to the End with the best items? 

Control: Use the Arrow-Keys (Or "WASD") to navigate and "Space" for attacking.  With "i" or clicking on the inventory-icon you will open the inventory.

The armor can be destroyed - so collect many of them to use them wisely.
